long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Tanpura Tool by Artium Academy brings the soothing sounds of the Tanpura right to your browser. Designed for musicians, students, and music lovers, this Chrome extension lets you play authentic Tanpura sounds with adjustable pitch and tempo, perfect for practicing Carnatic and Hindustani music.
Features include:
1. Adjustable pitch and tempo for personalized practice.
2. Simple and intuitive interface.
3. Lightweight extension for distraction-free use.
Artium Academy is dedicated to empowering music learners worldwide with innovative tools and high-quality music education. Explore more about our courses and book a free trial on our website.
